    • Constructor Detail

      • JUnitStep

        public JUnitStep(Set<String> classpathEntries,
         Set<String> testClassNames,
         List<String> vmArgs,
         String directoryForTestResults,
         boolean isCodeCoverageEnabled,
         boolean isDebugEnabled)
        Parameters:
        classpathEntries - contains the entries that will be listed first in the classpath when running JUnit. Entries for the bootclasspath for Android will be appended to this list, as well as an entry for the test runner. classpathEntries must include entries for the tests that will be run, as well as an entry for JUnit.
        testClassNames - the fully qualified names of the Java tests to run
        directoryForTestResults - directory where test results should be written

    • Method Detail

      • getShortName

        public String getShortName()
        Returns:
        a short name/description for the command, such as "javac". Should fit on one line.
